prices.title: Only Tonight! Buy a VEGGIE burger, get the second one FREE!!!
prices.description: Yes yes, tonight is '2 halen, 1 betalen' on all our veggie burgers! BIG IN JAPAN, WHATSAPP DOC, CIAO MARCO 3.0 or VEGAN DUSHI. A good time to buy someone dinner!

prices.title: Special Lemon Cheesecake by Lisette
prices.description: Hmmm where did the summer go?  Well at least our chef Lisette made her famous lemon cheesecake today so a piece of that might cheer you up, together with a hot cup of tea?
